title: (x) "Kikolini Cafe" Greek looking glyphic sans - Lithos {Patrick}
content:
Any ideas? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080908102313im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Nikolini_Cafe.jpg)

 [‹ pen script "Saving"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080908102313/http:/typophile.com/node/18157 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Blackletter in The Knickerbocker Press book (1914) - Psalter Gotisch {David H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080908102313/http:/typophile.com/node/15502 "Go to next forum topic")
author: letsgobuffs

comments.content:
Thought I’d steal this easy one, I’m sure some of the seasoned pros were waiting for some loathly design student to id this one and get some glory. haha.

Also quick question? Why does Lithos resemble Kabel Demi?
